title: Free Safety Mike Trout
description:
Mike Trout hops on the podcast today to discuss his seven-game homer streak, Aaron Judge’s incredible year, the difficulty of being a hitter in this era, and comparing Ohtani's performance last year to this season. Then, play-by-play man Michael Kay joins to discuss calling a historic performance by Aaron Judge, how is preparing for a potential Judge record-breaking game, and his favorite call of a milestone baseball moment. Later, Todd Radom joins for this week’s phantom franchise and administers the weekly quiz. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: Free Safety Mike Trout: Mike Trout joins the podcast to break down his year, Aaron Judge's incredible season, and comparing Ohtani's performance last year to this season.
